Welcome to Ghost Shield

Wowzers.

Color Variables

Gray option for section backgrounds

// variable
$gray-light

// class
.gray-light-bg

Another gray option for a section

// variable
$gray-med

// class
.gray-med-bg

Footer background & default text color

// variable
$gray-dark

// class
.gray-dark-bg

For Mobile course

// variable
$blue

// classes
.blue-bg
.blue-text

For JS course

// variable
$yellow

// classes
.yellow-bg
.yellow-text

For Ruby course

// variable
$red

// classes
.red-bg
.red-text

For sponsor section

// variable
$gold

// class
.gold-bg
.gold-text

It's blue!

// variable
$blue-link

// class
.blue-link-bg

For 'Say Hello' button

// variable
$blue-contact

// class
.blue-contact-bg

Headings

Paragraphs

Art party wayfarers Schlitz photo booth lomo, authentic whatever bicycle rights Thundercats DIY. Master cleanse Portland squid, beard keytar Helvetica sriracha street art gentrify art party ethnic. Typewriter fixie kale chips craft beer Truffaut. Vegan direct trade meh, pour-over actually kale chips wayfarers Portland. Cardigan Williamsburg flexitarian, narwhal master cleanse McSweeney's banh mi letterpress ennui brunch chia polaroid hoodie meggings 8-bit.

Here is what a paragraph would look like. And here is a link.

---
p Art party wayfarers Schlitz photo booth lomo ... 
---
p Here is what a paragraph with a <a href="#">link</a>.

Unordered Lists

  • Selvage Portland keytar
  • Hashtag PBR&B
  • For longer bullets, use the <strong> tag at the beginning.Wes Anderson craft beer 90's, leggings bitters gentrify gastropub normcore Shoreditch polaroid Cosby sweater tattooed. Drinking vinegar brunch leggings Carles, chillwave authentic cray stumptown cardigan hella. Meh artisan lo-fi pour-over distillery. Gluten-free put a bird on it drinking vinegar, Thundercats mumblecore wayfarers blog scenester small batch.
    • Raw denim
    • Gluten-free Etsy pug
    • Thundercats
---
ul
  li Selvage Portland keytar
  li Hashtag PBR&B
  li <strong>For longer bullets ...</strong> ...
  ul
    li Raw denim
    li Gluten-free Etsy pug
    li Thundercats

Ordered Lists

  1. Direct trade
  2. Neutra bitters
  3. Wes Anderson
---
ol
  li Direct trade
  li Neutra bitters
  li Wes Anderson

Pullquotes

- Hispteria Crazedor, Coffee Shop Prophet
